General.Name: Business Alignment Public Company Limited
General.Description: Business Alignment Public Company Limited engages in the sale of medical equipment in Thailand. The company is also involved in the medical equipment installation and related activities, such as building construction for locating medical equipment, provision of repair and maintenance, and medical equipment efficiency increasing services. In addition, it operates specialized cancer treatment hospitals. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
